Thank you very much for your time and guidance.

Best regards,

original_text: I’m honestly so done with these shifting deadlines. How are we supposed to plan anything properly?
response_4_1:
Subject: Concerns About Shifting Deadlines

Hi [Recipient’s Name],

I wanted to express my frustration regarding the frequent changes to our deadlines. It’s becoming increasingly difficult to plan our work effectively when the timelines keep shifting. This uncertainty makes it challenging to allocate resources and ensure that we’re meeting expectations.

Could we please discuss how to establish more consistent deadlines moving forward? I believe this would help us all plan better and deliver higher quality results.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,  
[Your Name]
response_mini:
Subject: Concerns Regarding Shifting Deadlines

I believe that having stable deadlines is crucial for our productivity and overall success. It would greatly benefit the team if we could establish clearer timelines moving forward. 

Thank you for considering my perspective. I appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to your thoughts.

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Contact Information]

This is a friendly reminder that you have reached 80% of your monthly API usage limit. We want to ensure that your service continues without interruption.

To avoid any potential disruption, please consider upgrading your plan or reducing your API usage for the remainder of the month.

If you have any questions or need assistance with upgrading your plan, please feel free to contact our support team.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

[Your Company Name] Support Team
